refnamediv.refpurpose: Distributed configuration management for DRBD drbdmanage

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: drbdmanage is a utility for the simplified and automated administration of resources on a multiple-node DRBD 9 cluster. It accomplishes this task by running a local server process on each member node of a drbdmanage domain. As these local servers communicate with servers on other nodes, administrators can use any member node to control resources on all nodes of a drbdmanage domain.

refsect1.title: Quick overview of drbdmanage basics
refsect1.para: The objects that drbdmanage works with are nodes, resources, volumes and assignments. drbdmanage keeps records describing these objects in its data tables. A node record defines a member node of a drbdmanage domain. A resource record defines a DRBD resource for use with drbdmanage, and volume records define the DRBD volumes of a resource. Resources can then be deployed on a number of nodes, thereby implicitly creating a number of associated assignment records.
